title: when you will give us the free tokens at the worlds missons ?

embed.description: The pursuit of mastery requires sacrifice and perseverance. During this year's Worlds, we've put together a series of weekly missions for you that are sure to challenge you. Starting 9/21/17 at 11:00 AM PT until the day after Finals, we'll have a set of challenging missions for you that will change each week.

body: i have finished all the world missions and i have also the master pass and you said that we will have 175 tokens for free

replies.body: Hey there, there are no tokens given for free without completing missions.  The free portion means that all players get a specific set of missions that does not require having the Missions pass.  Sorry for the confusion!
